Source code for havoc.autoval.lib.host.models.openbmc_yosemite

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.openbmc import OpenBMC
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.autoval import AutovalUtils
from havoc.lib.decorators import retry
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.autoval_exceptions import TestError
import re


[docs]class OpenBMCYosemite(OpenBMC):

[docs]    def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
        super(OpenBMCYosemite, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs)


    # OEM Related

[docs]    def cmos_clear(self):
        super(OpenBMCYosemite, self).cmos_clear()



[docs]    def health_check(self):
        # Determine if it's a OpenBMC Yosemite
        is_openbmcyosemite = self.detect_openbmc_model("Yosemite")
        if not is_openbmcyosemite:
            raise Exception("No OpenBMC Yosemite device detected")
        else:
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Detected server Yosemite")



[docs]    def get_slot_info(self):
        if self.host.rack_sub_position_slot:
            return "slot" + str(self.host.rack_sub_position_slot)
        else:
            return None



[docs]    def get_fru_no(self):
        slot = self.get_slot_info()
        if slot is None:
            raise TestError("No slots specified")
        match = re.search(r"slot(\d+)", slot)
        slot_no = int(match.group(1))
        return slot_no



[docs]    @retry(tries=6, sleep_seconds=3, exponential=True)
    def get_fw_versions(self):
        out = ""
        cmd = "/usr/bin/fw-util %s --version" % self.slot_info
        out = self.bmc_host.run(cmd)
        versions = self.parse_fw_data(out)
        versions['bmc_version'] = self.get_openbmc_version()
        return versions



[docs]    def get_critical_services(self):
        '''
        This method returns a list of services that are always expected to
        run on the openBMC Yosemite System
        '''
        return ['fscd']



[docs]    def spb_sensor_data(self):
        cmd = "/usr/local/bin/sensor-util spb"
        out = self.bmc_host.run(cmd)
        return out



[docs]    def get_full_sensor_data(self):
        out = self.host.oob.sensor_data()
        out += "\n" + self.spb_sensor_data()
        return out



[docs]    def get_full_sensor_data_all_slots(self):
        base = super(OpenBMCYosemite, self).get_full_sensor_data()
        base += "\n" + self.spb_sensor_data()
        return base


    # SPB FRUs

[docs]    def spb_fru_list(self):
        cmd = "/usr/local/bin/fruid-util spb"
        out = self.bmc_host.run(cmd)
        return out


    # NIC FRUs

[docs]    def nic_fru_list(self):
        cmd = "/usr/local/bin/fruid-util nic"
        out = self.bmc_host.run(cmd)
        return out



[docs]    def get_full_fruid_list(self):
        base = super(OpenBMCYosemite, self).fru_list()
        base += "\n" + self.spb_fru_list()
        base += "\n" + self.nic_fru_list()
        return base



[docs]    def get_fw_util_options(self):
        base = super(OpenBMCYosemite, self).fw_util()
        return base



[docs]    def get_system_logs(self):
        return self.host.oob.log_message()



[docs]    def verify_flash_sensors(self, out):
        #Currently not supported on YV
        return out
